query: query GetLevelData($userId: Int!) { user_by_pk(id: $userId) { id login level totalUp totalDown auditRatio } transaction(where: {userId: {_eq: $userId}, type: {_eq: "level"}}, order_by: {createdAt: desc}, limit: 10) { id type amount path createdAt attrs } xp_view(where: {userId: {_eq: $userId}}) { userId amount level progress } }
